title: Microsoft Closes the Market Gap With Apple
text: LIVE COVERAGE | CONCLUDED Last Updated: Jan. 10, 2024 at 7:32 PM EST 3 months ago By Karishma Vanjani Shares of Microsoft rose Wednesday, helping push the software services’ company closer to becoming the top U.S. company by market capitalization. Microsoft is now about 1% or $31 billion away from overtaking Apple’s market cap. The last time Microsoft was ahead of Apple was November 2021, according to Dow Jones Market Data. Apple and Microsoft are the only two U.S. companies that have claimed the title of being the top U.S. company in terms of market cap since Feb. 2019. Amazon held the crown before that. Microsoft’s stock was up 1.5% on Wednesday. Microsoft Corp. MSFT (U.S.: Nasdaq) Apple Inc. AAPL (U.S.: Nasdaq) Advertisement - Scroll to Continue
